data.actual_result: The text remain in your previous language, requiring you to refresh for the change to properly apply
data.expected_result: The text should be in your newly chosen language
data.short_description: "All Transactions" text doesn't adapt initially after changing your client language
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your client language to something other than your currently chosen one - Go into your User Settings -> Billing and observe the "All Transaction" text
